passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > header > div > div:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(4) > section:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(1) > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(4) > section:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(4) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(4) > section:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(5) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(4) > section:nth-child(3) > section:nth-child(6) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > a > h5:nth-child(2)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(3) > nav:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(1) > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(3) > nav:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(1) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(3) > nav:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(3) > nav:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(3) > nav:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(4) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(3) > nav:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(5) > h5:nth-child(1)
